GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4.180 to before v5.4.204
GSD.description:
net: usb: ax88179_178a: Fix packet receiving

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.204 by commit 7f89bb5d710283e6505ff8003e628baf5a6de3a9, it was introduced in version v5.4.180 by commit a0fd5492ee769029a636f1fb521716b022b1423d. For more details please see the references link.
